Snippets: There's a big bug on the table. I hate bugs. Please make the bug go away.
I love going to Torchy's Tacos. They have excellent tacos. I burn my mouth sometimes though.
Austin is a wonderful city. However the housing in downtown is quite pricy. I wouldn't want to pay that much money.
Freescale is a fun place to work. There are a lot of old people here though. Sometimes I feel alone at work.
The other IT interns are downstairs so I don't get to see them much. I do like seeing them though. They are my friends.
